practice_phrases.target: feeling as if I can say

practice_phrases.known: 我喜欢感觉好像我会说英语
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I am going to speak English

practice_phrases.known: 好像我很快就准备好了
practice_phrases.target: as if I am ready soon

practice_phrases.known: 我想感觉好像我知道怎么说
practice_phrases.target: I want to feel as if I know how to say

practice_phrases.known: 我喜欢感觉好像我快准备好要学习英语了
practice_phrases.target: I like feeling as if I am nearly ready to learn English

practice_phrases.known: 她感觉好像她不能回答，但我猜她能轻松说
practice_phrases.target: she feels as if she can not answer, but I guess she can say it easily
